subject: Re: [junit] testing collections
msgSnippet: I think there is a J-Unit add-on that can help with testing private members...if that is what your question is. ... Hello, Please bear with me if this is an
messageBody:
I think there is a J-Unit add-on that can help with testing private members...if that is what your question is.

-------------- Original message --------------
Hello,

Please bear with me if this is an old oft answered question.

I have a void method which takes in a java.util.Collection parameter -
filled with Strings, performs some validations and sets a private
member that is also a collection - filled with
javax.mail.InternetAddress. How do I test this setter method through
JUnit?

-Eagle
